task.summary: Default task
Added SchedType structure, added a couple of records.
Added more code for add used method modal, but errors
Added other version of nested form for used methods. Need to ensure the old method still works for subject module addition and then fix the edit view for portfolio
Fixed currency list on portfolio
Fixed dynamic lists and modded both portfolio and subject to use inplace nested fields. Need to resolve why only one nested field adding at a time for portfolio so far

Fixed add method button to be able to allow addition of multiple nested children. Had to modify helper to replace strings. Also , modified button to add new row after the last record, using the tr:last option

Modded to convert tags to links which allow them to link to index pages with subset of content based which have that tag. Need to set so that the page tells you that you are looking at a subset based on a tag.
Have just added Opinions scaffold and table to system, adding source and portfolio as potential items for opinions using polymorpic.
Have added friendly_id system for permalink slugs to Subject, Sources and Users. Need to sort out for Blog
Installed sitemap generator gem - not configured yet
Completed configuration of sitemap for both main app + blog.
Added Slug to Subject_modules to allow Friendly_id for SEF. Still need to work out a suitable page for the modules

Started modifications to store created by and updated by id for various models including portfolio, subject, source, subject_module. All tying back to User model. Opinion already has a user id reference that may be sufficient since an opinion should only be creatable and modifiable by one person.

Completed modifications to models and controllers for assignment of items based on current user - subject, portfolio, source. created_by and updated_by fields in each table. Opinions table still deemed unnecessary
Made modifications to Opinions model, views (basic) and controller to tie portfolio to opinions. Views are very limited and will have to be redesigned to improve usability
Just some basic view changes for Opinions
Started addition of portfolio to friendly id slugs. Need to figure out how to add other class fields to name definition inside class object
Modified opinions to include slugs, added title field, modified views accordingly.

Last commit after installing PostGreSql. Added to gems and converted database.yaml to point to PG DB. Had to dump from SQLite3 to a sql file, change out a number of field types to ensure compatibility, then run it on the PG database, Let's hope it works.
Last, Last commit after installing PostGreSql. This is the dump file that was used
INstalled PG Search on Postgres, added support for 'against associated' records to be able to find a record thru searches on its children's contents. Setup Portfolio, subject
Added source to against associated search with opinion and source type
Added source to against associated search with opinion and source type
fixed search associated against with multiple table fields for opinions. Need to modify opinions controller to be polymorphic
Converted portfolio - opinion related paths to polymorphic_path. Mainly done inside opinion controller, pages etc. Now moving to Sources
Added search functionality for all aspects of site content including blogit engine. Need to determine how the changes to the blogit content would be moved to production.

Added User authentication and authorization using devise, cancan and rolify to create abilities. Still WIP, need to finalize how to handle the CRUD for various resources and finalize the different roles
Added roles controller rolify as well as configured search for blogit engine. Changes made directly to engine files, need to sort out override of engine thru local files
Added overridden blogit post controller to project. Need to sort out so that it references the original
Used decorator to override index action in posts controller. Local posts controller renamed to p11osts as it's not needed anymore.
Finished up some role stuff, changed user role table to include created fields, created a new version of the users_role table
removed module id change to allow migrate to pass

renamed the class in the file to allow success
commented out the rename column as the table hasn't existed yet
commented out the line as i had done a remove and retried the add with the proper reference type two migrates later.
commented out columns as the column name is correct already
column name actually existed and needs to be removed so comment removed as well as :integer removed from both costtype and schedtype removal migrations

removing the index from the old users_roles (1)
removing the index from the old users_roles (1)
Made changes for publishing to digital ocean
Setup wookmark on subject index page. Need to modify parent page to allow user to select table or grid view
Setup Twitter-BootStrap-rails and modified certain portfolio and subject views. Also, setup grid vs list for subject page.
modified aesthetics to use more bootstrap, added grid/list views for source and portfolio
fixed search controller to allow for two different search field names since the main search was modified to 'searchqrybig' to allow separate styling

overall style changes with bootstrap overrides, changed fonts, colours

created an extension of the blogit post model with necessary fields in order to allow various things such as search to work for blogit on heroku and digital ocean
